title: Autonomous Wheelchair
description: For my master's thesis I worked in the development of an autonomous wheelchair. The project consisted of the development of a control system for the wheelchair to navigate autonomously in indoor environments. The project was developed using ROS2, Gazebo, and Python. You can see a demo of the robotic platform in which the wheelchair was implemented.

title: Neural Network from Scratch
description: The project consists of the development of a neural network from scratch using Python (no pytorch, no tensorflow, just Numpy). The neural network was trained using the MNIST dataset.

title: Autonomous Sailboat
description: For my bachelor's thesis at UIUC (University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign) I worked in the development of an autonomous sailboat. The project consisted of the development of both the PCB and the software for the sailboat to navigate autonomously in a lake. The project was awarded with an outstanding engineering award
